item.title: Headless vncserver with Container
item.description: Prerequisites Docker intalled, up and running Start the vncserver It’s quite straightforward to run the vncserver with container. Here we use the image from accetto. docker run -d -p 5920:5901 -p 6901:6901 accetto/ubuntu-vnc-xfce-firefox-g3 Docker will pull the image if not found in the localhost. Connect to the vncserver via vnc viewer Here I use realvnc viwer on windows, enter <IP@>:5920 to connect, and enter the password, “headless”.
